runs.comm: length delivery outside off and Tamim drives it uppishly to cover point
chases the ball with hard hands again, this was a touch shorter and wider, and he missed this time
length delivery outside off again, Tamim pushes it towards cover point for a quick single
charges down first ball, goes for a wild swing outside off and misses it completely
beaten this time! That was a beauty - pitched it just outside off as Kayes tried to get bat on that with minimal footwork and the ball swung in, inches away from the off stump
errs on the pads, the fine leg is up, and Kayes whips it off the legs up and over the fielder in the circle for a four!
fullish outside off and it's driven down to mid off
pitches it a tad shorter, just outside off with hardly any room and Tamim looks to nudge it fine but misses
towards middle and leg now, it's flicked in the air to deep midwicket for one
short of length outside off and it's punched into the covers
slower short ball outside off, Kayes goes for the pull but is beaten by pace
Madziva oversteps and a free hit is coming up
pitched up, Tamim picks the length and dispatches it over the long-on boundary for a six!
short ball on the leg side and it's pulled awkwardly to fine leg as Panyangara falls in his follow through
he makes room early on, Panyangara pitches it wide outside off and outside the batsman's reach as he swings and misses. Oh, that's called a wide. Harsh call and unfair on the bowler
full toss this time and it's driven down to mid-on
smashes through the covers! Short of length outside off and Tamim punches it on the up in the gap in the covers for a powerful four
well wide outside the off stump and it's called so too
slow, low and full around off, Tamim mistimes it back to the bowler
quick and low full toss this time, it's driven to mid-off for a quick single
too full and a bit wide, there's enough room for Kayes and he steers it just wide of backward point for a well-timed four
short and on the leg side, Tamim waits for it and pulls it late to put it away behind square for another six!
on the leg side again, flicked a bit awkwardly and short fine leg gets a hand to it to keep it to two

short again, Tamim opens up to pull it away to the leg side but he hasn't middled it and it goes high and straight down to long on for a simple catch. Tamim has given it away in the middle of a strong start
outside the off stump, it's steered straight to point
full toss outside off is driven to extra cover
around off again, driven straight to cover
angles it in from around the wicket, the batsman makes room and drives on off for a single

is that taken cleanly, the umpires are checking for Williams' catch! Chisoro tossed it outside off and Kayes square drove it on the off side, Williams dived full length to his left with both hands and looks like he has got his fingers under it. Several replays later, he has been given out!
length delivery outside off and Mushy defends it off the back foot
length delivery around off and it's pushed back after the batsman was in two minds
makes a bit of room, chips it dangerously over midwicket and that lobbed just over Raza who was running back to catch the ball but it fell out of his reach
short and flat outside off, pushed back to Williams
fuller on middle and leg, and it's clipped to deep midwicket for one
comes down the track and drives it into the covers
around off again and it's worked to long off for one
some room outside off and it's driven uppishly to sweeper cover for two
no ball, and a free hit coming up as the batsman cut the high full toss outside off past backward point for four
length delivery on off is pushed into the covers but no time for a single
angles it in from well outside off and Mushy works it down to long on for one
towards middle stump and it's clipped to midwicket region for another single
a no ball for overstepping this time, and another free hit coming up
around off and it's pushed to short cover
outside off, Anamul unleashes a reverse sweep and sends that flying over short third man (fine leg) for four!
and he strikes first ball! Pitches it on leg with some turn from length, Mushy goes down on a knee and sweeps it high and deep for Williams to take a catch in the deep on the leg side
pushed towards cover point for one
nudges the ball from outside leg to short fine leg and they scamper for a run, close call for run out as they go upstairs! But he's safely in
presses forward to work the ball from middle and leg to midwicket and they take one
on middle and leg and it's worked to midwicket for one
pushes the length ball back from off and that lands just before the bowler
flicks this one past square leg for one
looks to defend but gets a thick edge to short third man for one
clipped to midwicket and they take off for a quick single as Williams runs across from his follow through to the leg side to stop the run but he can't
pretty flat on middle, nudged towards square leg for one
tries to sweep against the turn as the ball pitched well outside leg, and he misses
connects the sweep this time, picks it up from around off stump and beats deep backward square leg and deep midwicket to get a one-bounce four
tosses up a length delivery on off, he defends it back this time
did it carry? Sabbir shuffled across early to sweep, got a leading edge as Madziva dived forward to grab it with both hands, but it fell just short
on the leg side now and it's helped along to the left of short fine leg for one
short  and wide outside off, he opens up and swipes the ball with a cross bat to long
defends the length ball from off with soft hands to point for a single
short and quick towards off as Anamul walks down and gets s thick edge to short third man for one
on middle and leg and it's tucked to deep midwicket for one
errs on the pads again, clipped easily to leg for one
swept against the turn to deep square leg for one
short and wide with some turn, he comes out and cuts it to sweeper cover
comes down the track for a slog and gets an inside edge behind square on leg for two
defends the ball with soft hands towards point for one
goes for a slog by coming down the track and gets an inside edge onto his pad
guides the ball with the turn to short third man for one
short and flat on leg, nudged to square leg region for one
drives the ball with the turn to sweeper cover
shorter outside off and it's steered late to deep backward point for one
goes for a firm drive to find sweeper cover for one more
straighter delivery now and it's pushed back

was that a drop, nope it fell short! Anamul chipped the ball down the ground after making some room and it went straight in the direction of long off but the ball fell just before the fielder as he ran in and put in a dive
looks to reverse sweep, misses, and the ball goes down leg for four byes
turning away a bit and it's sliced off the back foot to point

loud appeal as the balls strikes him right in front of the stumps and easy decision to give that out! Sabbir went for what looked like a pre-meditated sweep, missed the flighted straight ball that pitched in front of middle and was hit on the back pad as he went down on a knee (to sweep, not to propose)
full on the stumps and it's flicked easily to long on
is beaten as he looks to drive outside off and misses
nudges the ball from middle and leg with soft hands to leg a bit of misfield gives them two
wide down the leg side, just past the pads
no room outside off, it's full too and Anamul digs it out to cover
just a bit outside off and it's helped to short third man
comes down and drives firmly but straight to cover
makes room this time as the ball is a bit wider outside off and he swishes at it uppishly to send the over the covers for four
short on off stump, punches it down to long on for one
comes out of the crease again to take the ball on the full and drives it up and over the covers, didn't quite middle it, and finds four more!
room outside off and it's cut straight to point

slower ball gets a wicket, Nasir drags the ball onto his stumps! Panyangara sent down a slower bouncer outside off by rolling his fingers over it and Nasir pulled to leg but got his timing completely wrong and got a bottom edge to his stumps
another inside edge and this one goes just past the stumps, oh and it's gone for four to beat fine leg
just back of length outside off and he defends it to cover
swipes on the leg side even as the ball pitched outside off and he got on top of it to slam it wide of deep midwicket to get four
what a catch at cover! Mahmudullah slammed this ball into the covers, it was low and Jongwe was alert at cover to grab it with both hands while diving to his left
swing and a miss for a full delivery outside off
looks to clip the ball to leg with the angle but gets a leg bye as the ball deflects to point off the pad
golden duck for the captain! Wickets were falling and he still went ahead with a wild slog to the leg side, missed it completely and the ball rattled the stumps as it came in with the angle
towards the leg stump and he clips it to square leg region for one
full and angling in towards middle and leg, Anamul helps it late to fine leg
full and tight on off stump, worked to midwicket for one
starts with a bouncer around middle as Sunny hooks and misses
another bouncer - this one just outside off and he swipes and misses again

falls short and there's a run out missed too! Sunny top edged the short ball of a pull and it landed just before deep midwicket who came in with a forward dive. Didn't get there on time but threw the ball back and the two batsmen were confused in the middle of the pitch whether to go for the third or nor, and Panyangara could not collect the ball cleanly to run out the batsman
anther bouncer and this time it's a no ball for height
the free hit is struck into the covers for one
tries the yorker but it's a bit too full and clipped to long leg for one
another one down! That was a half-volley from Panyangara to end his spell and Sunny went with a slog on the leg side only to be caught at wide long on
helps the ball to third man, that would have gone for four but Panyangara keeps it in for two

full and just outside off, Anamul slams it through the covers and sweeper cover chases. The throw comes back quickly but they want two, and Anamul falls short of his ground as the keeper takes the bails off after collecting a wide throw, to reach out for the stumps with his right hand as Anamul put in a dive
drives the ball to mid off only for one to end the innings
